display_long_description:
# Experience the Siege of Stalingrad Like Never Before
Immerse yourself in the most intense chapter of World War II in this cinematic VR action adventure. Every shot, every explosion, and the roar of artillery draw you deeper into the chaos of urban combat.

# 25 Adrenaline‑Fueled Missions

From frontal assaults on fortified lines, through daring sabotage operations, to relentless trench battles—each mission delivers unique challenges and pure adrenaline in this VR shooter.

**💣 Gear up, soldier—Stalingrad awaits your courage! 💣**
[media]
# Full VR Immersion

• Traverse ruined factories, rubble‑strewn streets, and muddy trenches

• Take cover under a rain of bullets and feel the thunder of artillery around you

• Operate heavy machine guns, sniper rifles, grenades, and explosive charges

• Command a tank in a crushing armored assault and unleash the power of steel beasts

**🏅 Will you survive? 🏅**
[media]

# Two Perspectives

Live the conflict as both a Soviet soldier and a German combatant—each side fighting for victory in the ultimate World War II showdown. 
Each campaign offers a unique storyline, weapons, and challenges—giving you two different experiences in one game.

**⚔️ Two sides. One city. Will you claim victory? ⚔️**
[media]
Prepare for a visceral VR odyssey that will test your courage, skill, and resolve in an action‑packed, historical setting.

# 🎯 Play Days of Heroes: Stalingrad - fight, survive, and claim victory in VR!
